pullRequest.title: Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()
pullRequest.bodyText: Utilize newer Java language features to simplfy code by using Object.equals() rather than equals().

commit.message:
Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

Utilize newer Java language features to simplfy code by using Object.equals() rather than equals().

Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

Simplified equals() method a bit further and replaced existing hashCode
method with Objects.hash()

Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

Updated the equals() and hashcode() methods in InputTableConfig and
Condition classes.

nodes.bodyText: This was changed from instanceof to the use of getClass(), which is not the same. The latter is more narrow. I think it should be changed back to instanceof, although the check for null would be redundant, since instanceof is always false if it's null.

commit.message:
Replace use of equals() with Object.equals()

Reverted getClass() back to original instanceof chedck in
Condition.java.
